passage_text: Meaning of Indian name: Aditi. Meaning of the name Aditi is 'Mother of the gods'. Aditi is a name of Hindu / Indian origin, and is commonly used for females. The name number for Aditi is '7'. Click here to get the numerological analysis for the name 'Aditi'.

Meaning of Aditi. In Sanskrit Aditi means Boundless, Entire, Freedom, Limitless, Unbroken.Aditi is a Hindu goddess of the sky so called Mother of all Gods. Aditi also means consciousness, the past, the future and fertility.

Hindi Meaning: The name Aditi is a Hindi baby name. In Hindi the meaning of the name Aditi is: Free. Indian Meaning: The name Aditi is an Indian baby name. In Indian the meaning of the name Aditi is: Free. SoulUrge Number: 1. Expression Number: 7. People with this name have a deep inner desire to use their abilities in leadership, and to have personal independence.

Aditi /adi-ti/ [3 sylls.] as a girls' name is of Hindi origin, and the meaning of Aditi is boundless. In Hindu cosmology, Aditi is the mother of the gods.
